architectureStyle.description: Mysterious, cold, refrigerated - designed for beings who never remove their environmental suits
keyElements: Cooling systems and cryo-tech visible everywhere
Completely sealed structures - no one knows what's inside
Asymmetrical, alien design unlike Alpha Quadrant species
Helmet-like building shapes echoing Breen refrigeration suits
No windows in the traditional sense - opaque viewports at best
architectureStyle.colors: Ice-blue, teal, white, silver metallic, frost-white accents
architectureStyle.materials: Cryogenic alloys, ice-resistant composites, thermal insulation
